title: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654 - Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second columns could be merged.
OB: a. The buttons are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up huge for methods with many parameters.
EB: The buttons should be the appropriate size. When the dialog comes up, a table entry should be selected. The move buttons should be disabled when no table entry is selected. The preview should not be cut off when changing a parameter name to something very long. The dialog should resize appropriately for methods with many parameters.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Change a parameter name to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview is cut off.
